articles.title: Cricket star Michael Slater collapses in court
articles.description: Former Australian cricket great Michael Slater has collapsed in court after failing in his bid for freedom over an alleged domestic violence incident.
articles.content:
Former Australian cricket great Michael Slater has collapsed in court after failing in his bid for freedom over an alleged domestic violence incident.

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
